metadata.name: Essence Of Happiness
metadata.description: The 'Essence Of Happiness' is based on the joy of good time. as the use of a girl in this animation shows for the embodiment of happiness. When looking at artwork, it's easy to feel the impressions of happiness. The girl is seen as a source of light and hope, and her presence is said to fill the world with happiness and joy. To see the true essence of happiness is to feel the artwork come alive.
